channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-20093] LlapOutputFomatService: Use ArrowBuf with Netty for Accounting
item.description:
Combining Unpooled.wrappedBuffer with Arrow buffers can create corrupted buffers from buffer reuse race-condition.

This change ensures Arrow memory to be accounted by the same BufferAllocator.

RootAllocator will return an ArrowBuf which cooperates with Arrow memory arrow accounting after Netty release(1) the buffer.
item.summary: LlapOutputFomatService: Use ArrowBuf with Netty for Accounting

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
